plan-content-1: Discover a new level of connection on Livria with the Community Plan and its "Communities" section. Immerse yourself in a space where shared interests come to life, allowing you to join communities created by other users with similar affinities.
plan-content-2: In each community, you can express your ideas through posts and enrich interactions by participating in discussions by commenting on other people's posts.

recommended.title: RECOMMENDATIONS FOR YOU
recommended.subtitle: Hi! Based on your preferences, here are some recommendations...
recommended.reminder: We hope you like them! Remember, you can mark your interest in each book with the bookmark and negative icons, respectively.

NoSearch: No results found in the search
RecoSearch: The following recommendations might interest you

community.title: COMMUNITY PLAN
community.description: Connect with other readers, share your thoughts and join spaces where reading comes alive.

worlds.title: DISCOVER NEW WORLDS
worlds.description: Explore recommended readings through the app and open the door to fascinating stories.

passion.title: SHARE YOUR PASSION
passion.description: Rate books, write reviews, and connect with other book lovers.

purchase.izipay: All our payments are made through Izipay. Upon accepting the terms and conditions, you will be redirected to the Izipay page where you can make your payment. A payment confirmation will be sent to your email.

confirmation.thanks-text: Livria thanks you for your purchase. We hope you enjoy your reading as much as we do. Delivery will be made as indicated.
